title: GPGalleryAI (GPGAI) â€” SFW Creator Galleries for GP
blurb: A SFW gallery and feed platform for pro users to publish and curate creations made with GP tools.
description: GPGalleryAI enables creators to host safe-for-work galleries, publish feed updates, organize collections, and attach provenance: prompts, model metadata, and hashes. Built for local-first operation with optional sync to shared indexes, plus moderation workflows and licensing/attribution support.
